name: phonebook-backend
description: This is a excercise files for the part 3 of fullstackopen

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Kirankumar Sripati
